summary: Brutal cold forces two Antarctic explorers to leave their team of sled dogs behind as they fend for their survival.
cast: Paul Walker|Bruce Greenwood|Moon Bloodgood|Wendy Crewson|Gerard Plunkett|August Schellenberg|Jason Biggs|D.J.|Timba|Koda|Jasmin|Apache|Buck|Noble|Troika|Flapjack|Dino|Sitka|Chase|Floyd|Ryan|Jasper|Lightning|Belinda Metz|Connor Christopher Levins|Duncan Fraser|Dan Ziskie|Michael David Simms|Daniel Bacon|Laara Sadiq|Malcolm Stewart|Dexter Bell|Garry Chalk|Brenda Campbell|Michael Adamthwaite|Buddy Cain|Damon Johnson|Richard Sali|Panou|Megan McKinnon|Levi Woods
title: Bajo cero
